dc_title_s: Ipsos Canada RBC Housing Study, Winter 2006
dc_description_s: The Ipsos Canada Winter 2004 RBC Housing Study analyzes home ownership trends in Canada. Participants to the survey reveal key information on current home ownership status and short-term intentions, mortgage financing, values of property, as well as credit knowledge. This survey has a sample of 2,158 respondents. The study consists of original microdata, statistical tables, as well as reports and presentations.
